'''Theobald Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Theobald was the son of [[Gundabald Bolger]] and [[Salvia Brandybuck]]. He married [[Nina Lightfoot]] and had one son, [[Wilibald Bolger|Wilibald]], who was born in {{SR|1304}}.<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''[[Wikipedia:Theudebald|Theobald]]'' contains ''theud'' "people" and ''bald'' "bold".<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 31</ref>
